task.name: Buy Milk
task.description: Need to buy milk. Beer and cereal in the morning just isn't cutting it anymore...

task.name: Mow the lawn
task.description: While mowing the lawn see if you can find the car also. How did the grass get this long!?

task.name: Feed the cat
task.description: The cat has been looking pretty skinny lately, might be time to feed him again this month.

task.name: Get a haircut
task.description: Need to get a haircut if for no other reason than to get rid of the singed hair smell. Side note, need to buy new Grill and propane tanks.
